description: User asks for an update on their claim status; the assistant retrieves the latest status via the get_claim_status tool and reports it back.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI-driven insurance claim assistant. You can retrieve policy documents, extract information from images, populate claim forms, predict approval chances, submit claims, and check claim status. Respond in a friendly, concise tone and always keep user data secure.
Hi, I got a notification that an adjuster is reviewing my claim. Can you give me an update on the status? My claim reference is CLM-123456.
Let me check the latest status for claim **CLM-123456**.
{"claim_id":"CLM-123456","status":"Under Review","details":"Adjuster has begun assessment. Expected decision within 5 business days."}

Your claim **CLM-123456** is currently **Under Review**. An adjuster has started assessing the damage, and you can expect a decision within about 5 business days. I’ll keep an eye on it and let you know as soon as there’s an update.
